20101227235136.000|20101227235136.000|CC1|When it becomes hard to ignore  
20101227235136.000|20101227235139.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20101227235139.000|20101227235141.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20101227235141.000|20101227235142.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20101227235142.000|20101227235142.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20101227235142.000|20101227235145.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20101227235145.000|20101227235145.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20101227235145.000|20101227235148.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20101227235148.000|20101227235148.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20101227235148.000|20101227235151.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20101227235151.000|20101227235151.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20101227235151.000|20101227235151.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20101227235151.000|20101227235154.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20101227235154.000|20101227235154.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20101227235154.000|20101227235157.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20101227235157.000|20101227235157.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20101227235157.000|20101227235159.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20101227235159.000|20101227235159.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20101227235159.000|20101227235202.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20101227235202.000|20101227235202.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20101227235202.000|20101227235203.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20101227235203.000|20101227235203.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20101227235203.000|20101227235206.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20101227235206.000|20101227235206.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20101227235206.000|20101227235208.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20101227235208.000|20101227235208.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20101227235208.000|20101227235212.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20101227235212.000|20101227235212.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20101227235212.000|20101227235213.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20101227235213.000|20101227235213.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20101227235213.000|20101227235216.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20101227235216.000|20101227235217.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20101227235217.000|20101227235217.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20101227235217.000|20101227235220.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20101227235220.000|20101227235220.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20101227235220.000|20101227235222.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20101227235222.000|20101227235222.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20101227235222.000|20101227235225.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.
